1. Punkt MC03 is a $699 privacy-focused Android phone, OS requires a subscription  9to5Google
  2. Minimal phone pioneer Punkt is back with a new privacy-focused model at CES  Engadget
  3. Punkt’s German-made MC03 smartphone comes to the US this spring  The Verge
  4. Punkt Has a New Smartphone for People Who Hate Smartphones  Lifehacker
